item.title: My friend, 62, may only have weeks to live. How does he prevent his second wife from inheriting everything?
My son’s father died, but his stepmother won’t return his calls. We don’t even know if there’s a will. What now?
item.description: “My son is hurt, to say the least, that she is acting this way.”

item.title: Why you’re better off betting on DraftKings’ stock than a Travis Kelce Super Bowl touchdown
item.description: Here are three ways to trade DraftKings’ stock, instead of gambling on the Super Bowl.

item.title: Inside the fight to stop Elon Musk and ‘DOGE’ from accessing your personal financial information

item.title: Worried about Elon Musk and DOGE getting your Social Security number? Here’s how to protect yourself.
item.description: If the wrong person gained access to personal financial information held by the U.S. Treasury, it would constitute the biggest data breach in history.
